  • CAN'T DRIVE IT TO THE SHOP?

    We provide mechanical repairs to your vehicle on site...home or business. We come to you so you don't have to worry about taking it to the shop.

  • GET YOUR VEHICLE FIXED RIGHT

    With over 40 years of experience, we'll fix your vehicle right the first time.

    We are committed to earning your trust by providing the expertise and value you expect.

WHY CHOOSE US?

We are one of the leading auto repair shops serving customers in the CSRA.
All mechanic services are performed by highly qualified mechanics.

  • EVERY JOB IS PERSONAL

    If you want the quality you would expect from the dealership, but with a more personal and friendly atmosphere, you have found it.

  • BEST MATERIALS

    You may provide the part needed or we can provide and install any part for you. I will come to you for minor repairs or diagnostics.

  • MAJOR REPAIR?

    Although our main service is on-site at your location, we offer a full-repair shop facility, located in Belvedere, SC, with available towing service.

AUTO REPAIR SERVICES

We come to you by appointment - quick, qualified & convenient. An estimate for the repair will always be provided before work begins. Our experienced service will get your vehicle running and back in good condition.

We offer online invoicing using PayPal, and will accept any major Visa, Mastercard, debit, or credit cards. Our mininum service call is $45.

OUR MISSION

We offer a full range of garage services to vehicle owners located in the CSRA. All services are performed by a highly qualified mechanic. We can handle any car problem.

We know how to handle a wide range of automotive problems. Whether you drive a passenger car, truck or SUV, we strive to ensure that your vehicle will be performing at its best when completing the repair.
